title: My Professional Evolution
description: From my early days in marketing to leadership roles at global consulting firms, my career has been guided by a passion for data-driven marketing and measurable business impact.

milestones.title: Vice President - Strategy & Marketing
milestones.description: Leading Marketing and Strategy functions including Market Research, Insights, Performance Marketing, Employer Branding and Sales Operations. Rebuilding the digital identity and helping business lines build growth roadmaps for the next 3 years.
achievements: Part of the CEO's office directly impacting company strategy
Building roadmap to pave way for external investments (IPO readiness)
Providing market insights, feature roadmap, TAM/SAM and Sales Pitch Refinement

milestones.title: Marketing Director
milestones.description: Led Employer Branding for BCG in Asia Pacific, managing a team of 10 marketers across 12 countries to deliver on BCG's talent strategy & DEI agenda via digital & social channels.
achievements: Developed BCG's talent attraction framework in Asia Pacific
Co-developed BCG's recruiting campaign 'Beyond is where we begin'
Reduced recruiting costs and time to hire while improving engagement rates

milestones.title: Senior Marketing Manager
milestones.description: Created the marketing and employer branding strategy for 12 countries in Asia Pacific. Built a team of 10 people to execute the strategy.
achievements: First person to join and establish the employer branding function
Took over all social media and digital platforms (LinkedIn, Meta, careers website, job boards)
Focused on enhancing brand value, reducing hiring costs and building candidate pipelines

milestones.title: Product Marketing Manager
milestones.description: Developed and executed product marketing strategies for BCG B2B solutions (Lighthouse, KEY, OrgBuilder), contributing to product adoption and revenue growth.
achievements: Spearheaded the launch of two B2B products with targeted go-to-market strategies
Managed end-to-end marketing campaigns from research to content creation
Leveraged data analytics to track and optimize marketing performance

milestones.title: Marketing Lead
milestones.description: Led comprehensive communication and PR strategies to enhance BCG's brand reputation and visibility in the B2B sector.
achievements: Managed media relations securing coverage in top-tier industry publications
Developed crisis communication plans and effectively mitigated negative publicity
Created thought leadership content positioning BCG as a leader in consulting

milestones.title: Senior Analyst
milestones.description: Worked on Product Marketing and management for the Digital Benchmarking Solution (McKBench).
achievements: Executed comprehensive marketing and sales strategy for the platform
Managed brand identity across all channels and touchpoints
Communicated platform value effectively to stakeholders

milestones.title: Analyst
milestones.description: Part of the Data Analytics team, creating analytical models for McKinsey's case teams using Excel, Macros, PowerPoint, SQL, and other technologies.
achievements: Supported consulting teams with data analysis and visualization
Developed robust models for client business cases
Translated complex data insights into actionable recommendations

milestones.title: Junior Analyst
milestones.description: Worked on the Data Analytics team, creating analytical models for McKinsey's case teams.

milestones.title: MIS Executive
milestones.description: Responsible for client reporting on call data, building business reports that supported decision-making, capturing metrics such as AHT and FCR using Excel and VBA.

milestones.title: Marketing Executive
milestones.description: Set up the office of SBI Mutual Funds in Shimla from the ground up. Built a network of local agents to sell Mutual Funds and leveraged the bank's network to bring in corporate customers.
